content: *cover your easter eggs with this adorable cozy sure to delight your kids lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80105ad skill level easy level 2 wool-ease® article #620 2 colors 1 ball each *shown in fisherman & blush heather* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm pom-pom maker for tail small black beads for eyes special stitch decrease single_crochet decrease some construction required to finish lion brand amigurumi egg cozies in wool-ease 80105ad amigurumi bunny egg cozy 80106ad amigurumi ducky egg cozy 1 80107ad amigurumi little lamb egg cozy 2 80108ad amigurumi carrot egg cozy 3 80109ad amigurumi egg cozy 4 vanna s choice version 90230ad wee rabbit egg cozy 5 *free registration at site required to access pattern * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amigurumi-ducky-egg-cozy 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amigurumi-little-lamb-egg-cozy 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amigurumi-carrot-egg-cozy 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/amigurumi-egg-cozy 5 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/90230ad html
